originalText.text: Visited NY from Seattle and my friend recommended Gisella Beauty for my facial. I am very particular and donâ€™t trust just anyone with my skin. Gisella was fantastic! Sheâ€™s been in the industry for decades, she examined my skin and customized the facial treatment and products accordingly. My skin is still glowing 3 days later and I have not even put any other products on. Gisella has a unique way of connecting with customers, she truly goes the extra mile to make you feel special. Being at her salon you donâ€™t just get an amazing facial, you get an unforgettable, feel good experience that you can never get anywhere else. Iâ€™d recommend Gisella to everyone!

originalText.text: Gisela is incredible! I moved to the neighborhood about a year ago and needed an anti-aging specialist for my sensitive skin. The products she uses she also has for purchase which have been very helpful when I go on extended trips and need to treat my skin. Thank you!

originalText.text: I recently had the most amazing facial experience with Gisella, an incredibly kind and warm professional who used top-of-the-line products. She was attentive to my concerns, allergies, and skin type, making sure the treatment was tailored just for me. The facial left my skin feeling fresh and radiant, and what stood out the most was her dedication to my satisfaction. She even followed up the next day to make sure my skin was looking and feeling great. Her personalized attention and genuine care made this experience truly memorable.

text.text: I recently had the most amazing facial experience with Gisella, an incredibly kind and warm professional who used top-of-the-line products. She was attentive to my concerns, allergies, and skin type, making sure the treatment was tailored just for me. She even followed up the next day to make sure my skin was looking and feeling great. Her personalized attention and genuine care made this experience truly memorable.

originalText.text:
I've been going to Gisella for years now and I'm so glad she finally has her own place. I normally don't write many reviews, but I had to make an exception for her. First off, as an esthetician, she is incredible. Her knowledge of all things pertaining to healthy and clear skin is second to none. She gives you personalized attention and knows exactly what's good for your skin to make it look phenomenal. She also gives fair prices and isn't out to scam you (a rarity in this field I've come to find). She is a consummate professional in every regard.

What really makes the experience incredible, though, is not just the amazing service you're getting, but Gisella herself. She is so warm and thoughtful and caring. You can tell she genuinely loves to help people and make them feel good, and she makes you feel like a family member immediately. You can truly feel the love from her. We love you Gisella!!!
